trait.name: Features
entries: {@classFeature Cunning Action|Rogue|PHB|2}, {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|PHB|1} ({@damage 4d6}), {@subclassFeature Assassinate|Rogue||Assassin|PHB|3}, {@item Thieves' Tools|phb}

action.name: {@item Dagger|phb}
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: {@item Dagger of Venom|dmg}
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage in melee, or 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage at range.
